sqlMap.select:
SELECT T1.PGMID, T1.SYSID, (SELECT SYSNAME FROM sy_sysmst WHERE SYSID = T1.SYSID) AS SYSNAME, T1.MENUID, (SELECT MENUNAME FROM sy_menutb WHERE SYSID = T1.SYSID AND MENUID = T1.MENUID) AS MENUNAME, T1.PGMNAME, T1.SORTKEY, T1.REMARK, T1.USEYN FROM sy_menupgmtb T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.SYSID = #SYSID#
AND T1.MENUID = #MENUID#
ORDER BY T1.SYSID, T1.MENUID, T1.SORTKEY ASC

SELECT T1.PGMID, T1.SYSID, (SELECT SYSNAME FROM SY_SYSMST WHERE SYSID = T1.SYSID) AS SYSNAME, T1.MENUID, (SELECT MENUNAME FROM SY_MENUTB WHERE SYSID = T1.SYSID AND MENUID = T1.MENUID) AS MENUNAME, T1.PGMNAME, T1.SORTKEY, T1.REMARK, T1.USEYN FROM SY_MENUPGMTB T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.SYSID = #SYSID# AND T1.MENUID = #MENUID# AND T1.PGMID = #PGMID# ORDER BY T1.SORTKEY ASC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SY_MENUPGMTB SET PGMNAME = #PGMNAME#, SORTKEY = #SORTKEY#, REMARK = #REMARK#, USEYN = #USEYN#, UPDATEUSER = #UPDATEUSER#, UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE() WHERE SYSID = #SYSID# AND MENUID = #MENUID# AND PGMID = #PGMID#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SY_MENUPGMTB ( PGMID, SYSID, MENUID, PGMNAME, SORTKEY, REMARK, USEYN, INSERTUSER, INSERTDATE ) VALUES( #PGMID#, #SYSID#, #MENUID#, #PGMNAME#, #SORTKEY#, #REMARK#, #USEYN#, #INSERTUSER#, SYSDATE() )
